    onActionAddAssociatedPart(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddProductFormController
    This method detects when the Add Associated Part button is pressed and adds it to the list of associated parts for this product.
    onActionAddAssociatedPart(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyProductFormController
    This method adds an associated part.
    onActionAddPart(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainFormController
    This method switches the scene to the Add Part form when the Add Part button is pressed.
    onActionAddProduct(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainFormController
    This method switches the scene to the Add Product form when the Add Product button is pressed.
    onActionAllPartsSearchKeyPressed(KeyEvent) - Method in class controller.AddProductFormController
    This method searches the list of parts.
    onActionAllPartsSearchKeyPressed(KeyEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyProductFormController
    This method searches the list of parts.
    onActionCancelModifyPart(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyPartFormController
    This method detects when the Cancel button is pressed and cancels the modification of a part.
    onActionCancelModifyProduct(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyProductFormController
    This method cancels the modification of the product.
    onActionCancelNewPart(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddPartFormController
    This method detects when the Cancel button is pressed and cancels the addition of a part.
    onActionCancelNewProduct(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddProductFormController
    This method detects when the Cancel button is pressed and cancels the new product.
    onActionDeletePart(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainFormController
    This method deletes a part from the list of parts.
    onActionDeleteProduct(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainFormController
    LOGICAL ERROR This method deletes a Product from the list of products.
    onActionExitMainForm(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainFormController
    FUTURE ENHANCEMENT This method exits the program when the exit button is clicked.
    onActionInHouseModify(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyPartFormController
    This method changes the MachineID/CompanyName Label to Machine ID when the In House radio button is selected.

    This method changes the MachineID/CompanyName Label to Machine ID when the In House radio button is selected.

    This method opens the modify part form when the modify part button is pressed.

    This method opens the modify product form when the modify product button is pressed.
    onActionOutsourcedModify(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyPartFormController
    This method changes the MachineID/CompanyName Label to Company Name when the Outsourced radio button is selected.
    onActionOutsourcedNew(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddPartFormController
    This method changes the MachineID/CompanyName Label to Company Name when the Outsourced radio button is selected.
    onActionPartSearchPressed(KeyEvent) - Method in class controller.MainFormController
    LOGICAL ERROR This method searches the list of parts when the enter key is pressed while the part search field is selected.
    onActionProductSearchPressed(KeyEvent) - Method in class controller.MainFormController
    This method searches the list of products when the enter key is pressed while the part search field is selected.
    onActionRemoveAssociatedPart(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddProductFormController
    This method detects when the Remove Asssociated Part button is pressed and removes the Part.
    onActionRemoveAssociatedPart(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyProductFormController
    This method removes a part from the list the product's of associated parts.
    onActionSaveModifyPart(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyPartFormController
    LOGICAL ERROR This method saves the modified part to the Inventory Management System.
    onActionSaveModifyProduct(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ModifyProductFormController
    This method saves the modified product over its original spot in the Inventory.
    onActionSaveNewPart(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddPartFormController
    LOGICAL ERROR This method saves the new part to the Inventory Management System.
    onActionSaveNewProduct(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddProductFormController
